verbs.description: [ARG0: pineapple cheese ball pineapple] [V: lends] [ARG1: a fruity tang] [ARG2: to this fun and tasty appetizer instead of one large cheese ball you could make two smaller ones one to serve before a meal and one to take to a party] —anne halfhill sunbury ohio
